website_summaries.verdict: A golf chipping net that combines affordability and durability.
pros: Constructed from all-weather material, so net will serve you well for years to come
cons: Doesn't stay in place in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: Yep, go for it!!
customer_reviews.text: My teen son requested this as a gift and is enjoying using it. He is just now getting into the sport of golf and wanted this target for practice. Both he and his older cousin frequently practice in the backyard and this chipping target has given him a physical target to chip towards. It is small, easy to store, and has held up to outside elements so far (several months). I would recommend this for any beginning to advanced golfer that wants to perfect his/her shot...it's a simple tool that, when used, can really impact one's game. A definite recommended buy!
customer_reviews.author: casocorcoran

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He is 12 and has decided to be a PGA pro when he grows up. So to encourage the dream I have purchased several different golfing aids. This one is great. My son starts with a pile of balls and chips away until they are all gone and this target seems to hold them all. It is a bit flimsy, but I assume that is for portability. I would recommend this as a good practicing tool for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ober

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of an indoor practice tool when i ran across this net. I now practice my short game inside on an almost daily basis. I can already see improvements in my game so I would highly recommend to anyone looking to get better around the green.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Use this in the backyard to practice short game and although it serves its purpose, it is a little too light. Wind will blow and knock it over if it isn't anchored with the metal steaks (which I'd rather not have to deal with). Also the red target in the middle is attached with velcro arms so you will need to attach and detach upon each use. Would have preferred something with more substance. Not bad for the price but I would spend a little more for a little more quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and store
customer_reviews.text: I ended up removing the center target because golf balls would get caught up in that when trying to remove them. The net springs open and two stakes secure it in place. To store, you fold and then twist and fold, place the band on it to keep it folded and it tucks away nicely. I found that I am using it more than I had planned.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Chipping Challenger
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I thought this would really help me with chipping, but it is harder than I ever thought. I don't shy away from a challenge so I am still working on mastering the center net. It does what I expected in that it stays in place with the pins you provided. Its versatile in that I can move it to different lengths in my yard without effort. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Decent Chipping Net
customer_reviews.text: Serves it's the purpose as a chipping net, but the moment a ball goes into the net, it tips over. There's also a chance the middle target comes loose since it's being hung up by velcro straps. Good product for the price has some flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Net
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and take down. Great for the backyard. I like how this model lies on the ground compared to elevated chipping nets.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Just received this chipping net and tested it out with some buddies. Can't beat the value. I would recommend buying two so when you're retrieving balls you can hit in both directions. Also made up a 2 on 2 chipping game for fun and practice.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our basement/rec room. We use it with wiffle balls, but we've hit a few golf balls in as well and everything has worked fine. Great gift idea for any golfer!
customer_reviews.author: Alan M. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift... so I guess it's oka
customer_reviews.text: No idea, but I got this as a gift for someone and the only way to get this off my list of products that still need a review is to review it. So the picture looks like fun, and I haven't heard any complaints... that's all I got
customer_reviews.author: CaseyVR6

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is for the price and that's ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is for the price and that's okay. We had a blast with this for a party game.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea
customer_reviews.text: This net is a nice idea but misses the mark a bit. It is pretty flimsy and does not like to sit up straight. Also, any little bit of wind will blow it over. I wish that I had spent a bit more money and bought one of the larger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lmwest

customer_reviews.title: It is an inexpensive way to work on your chipping/pitching ...
customer_reviews.text: It is an inexpensive way to work on your chipping/pitching stroke. The only drawback so far is that if a ball hits high enough on the netting, it tips over and you have to go set it upright again.
customer_reviews.author: relaxretired

customer_reviews.title: i love this! perfect for practicing in the backyard
customer_reviews.text: i love this! perfect for practicing in the backyard, a park or at a driving range. easy to use and stays put
customer_reviews.author: david pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product - has definitely assisted me with learning to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product - has definitely assisted me with learning to chip properly, just need to remember keep my head down lol.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: it is sturdy and should stand up to repeated use under given ...
customer_reviews.text: Practically all set up upon arrival, works as described. The only caution is to heed the warning to open in a wide, clear area. It springs fully open when the storage band is removed. Lesson learned.it is sturdy and should stand up to repeated use under given instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Moesky

customer_reviews.title: fun little net to practice with
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with a birthday package of the Rukket golf mat, and Nike mix balls 50 count, fun little net to practice with. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: TatteredDawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect golfer gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and brother-in-law, both of whom are extremely difficult to shop for and it's been great. The both were very happy and hopefully they ill both improve their respective games some! :)
customer_reviews.author: Reneé R

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: The Izzo Mini Mouth Net is very simple. Simple set up and simple to use. Not quite as sturdy as one might like but for the price you can't beat it. I have used it both indoors and outdoors and my short game has improved greatly. I would recomend this product to any one who is serious about improving their golf game. J. Crow Louisville, KY
customer_reviews.author: jcrow1

customer_reviews.title: This was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This was great while it lasted. Really helped out with my chipping. Just make sure to you take the balls out before dogs sees them.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Make practice fun
customer_reviews.text: Practice landing your shots on line at the correct distance. Very portable. I use a small mat on my patio and get a kick out of dropping shots in the center ring. How many shots can you drop off your scorecard by hitting the approach where you want?
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Chipping Target
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to set-up and use.This is a great practice tool for chip shots in doors and out doors, rain or shine you can practice chip shop. Nice to be able to practice from different types of grass.
customer_reviews.author: Kix Porkie Alba

customer_reviews.title: Great portable practice net.
customer_reviews.text: Compact, lightweight and easy to use. Sets up quickly and is fun to use. Recommend getting a mat so you do not tear your lawn up.
customer_reviews.author: Ack

customer_reviews.title: Chipping net
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make chipping practice fun and challenging. Looks like it should hold up to many sessions in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: A L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for practice, could have been made a little stronger but still does the job
customer_reviews.author: justin kemp

customer_reviews.title: great target. been chipping in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: great target. been chipping in my backyard, instead of the stake i put a couple of rocks in it to hold it down.
customer_reviews.author: Nugget Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just started learning to play golf. This chipping net with a putting mat i am able to practice out in the yard. But if your looking to practice your swing look for a driving net on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH W.

customer_reviews.title: Use it in the backyard all the time. Holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it in the backyard all the time. Holds up. I have used both real and practice balls from Callaway.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Izzo Mini Mouth 24-Inch Chipping Target
customer_reviews.text: Good little chipping net to practice indoors during winter and in the yard during summer to keep you chipping technique in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was concerned it would be too small, since the name says "mini." It's not huge, but definitely not tiny. I would the right size for its use.
customer_reviews.author: FLJ

customer_reviews.title: 12 year old Son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Chipping Target is bigger than I expected but measures 24 inches Just as shown...my son enjoys chipping into this, works as described.
customer_reviews.author: CurtisCrew

customer_reviews.title: its ok at best.
customer_reviews.text: Too small and low to the ground for my liking, its ok at best.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Patka

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backyard golf practice tool, especially since we all need to work on our short game! It is portable and easily folds up. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Product Junky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Once you figure it out it is great
customer_reviews.author: Joel Banks

customer_reviews.title: Chipping net
customer_reviews.text: Net is just how described and work as described. Hasn't improved my chipping yet but I am just getting started.
customer_reviews.author: Schwenker

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Folds up nicely
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Folds up nicely. It's not a big deal to stake it in the ground. I'd rather have it lightweight and stake it than bulky and heavy and I don't.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Great golf practice net.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet golf net, good quality, fun to use. I keep it outside year round and it holds up well to weather.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great size for practice
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for set up / take down for practice . It is a part of the game like putting that never gets enough attention , so this will help for sure if you use it!
customer_reviews.author: shanghai-jim

customer_reviews.title: Nice practice aid
customer_reviews.text: Great for practicing chips from various distances. If you hit the net you don't chase golf balls.
customer_reviews.author: Clark A. Niepert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value, easy to setup & light weight. Good for my little golfer to practice chipping indoor or outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wee

customer_reviews.title: Very neat. Folds up small, and pops open ...
customer_reviews.text: Very neat. Folds up small, and pops open when you want to use it. Very simple.
customer_reviews.author: david w. cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice tool for chip shots. It works great and has improved my short game considerably. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was slightly bigger but its great for chipping and short distance pitching practice.
customer_reviews.author: Rogan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory for any golfer, can fit into a small book bag
customer_reviews.author: Jason Aveard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has been a big help with my shots from off the green.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the one one I had and this was less expensive and collapsable
customer_reviews.author: TonyC0311

customer_reviews.title: great purchase! I like how the red target net ...
customer_reviews.text: great purchase! I like how the red target net detaches. I like to use it as a basket when retrieving balls while practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Newport

customer_reviews.title: Chipping net
customer_reviews.text: Does the job of catching the balls you chip, easy setup and take down. recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price. easy to open and put back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Net works well if you have something heavy to hold it in place. otherwise it will move around when you hit balls into it.
customer_reviews.author: GolferDaddy3

customer_reviews.title: Chipping fun
customer_reviews.text: great for back yard practice. Small size is easy to store. Nice to be able to practice from different types of grass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too light with no way to secure to ground
customer_reviews.text: too light and once the ball hits the net, it changes direction
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Outside only
customer_reviews.text: This only works outside as it doesn't have enough structure unless it is anchored. I would go with the hard frame if you're using indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Price

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: I bought the target net for use indoors, but found that it is meant for outdoor use as it is light and needs to be anchored with the included anchor rods driven into the ground. Fortunately the floor in my attic is unfinished, so I am able to achor the net with some heave staples that electricians use to hold romex wire down. I use plastic balls mostly and use it a lot to help me with my swing at impact.
customer_reviews.author: William Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I bought it for my 10 year old, for home practice he loves it looks just like the picture came brand new in a unbroken seal box fast good company to order from
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & Weight
customer_reviews.text: The net is the perfect size and weight and goes well with an indoor putting mat. My only complaint would be the bottom nylon part of the netting is too tall for any balls to score in the lower 4th section.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy yet portable
customer_reviews.text: My husband's old one was eaten by the sun here in Vegas so I was looking for a replacement. This works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Balli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: improved my chip shot after only practicing twice with this product
customer_reviews.author: jose arellano

customer_reviews.title: poor design, not worth the savings
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fine, function is not what I consider acceptable. The front of the net sits on the ground. It is not designed for the traditional wedge shot, it is more of a 6 iron trajectory. I returned it and purchased JEF World of Golf Collapsible Chipping Net from Amazon. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick from MKE

customer_reviews.title: There are two "L" shaped 6" metal pins to hold it down which were okay but 3 tent spikes are better. We also bought a hole cup w
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little hummer for a family event as we have several golfers who aren't enthusiastic about some of the other games we planned. It went over well. There are two "L" shaped 6" metal pins to hold it down which were okay but 3 tent spikes are better. We also bought a hole cup with a #19 Flag and there was fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia62

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit like a beach tent to setup but otherwise a handy golfing tool.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Smaller than I thought but great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janale

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then I thought it was going to be but ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I thought it was going to be but still works for what you may need to work on
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to practice my chipping and have been really happy. I'm using foam and whiffle balls, no real ones yet, since I'm in doors. It collapses and is light and easy to move. It does come with some steaks in case you do want to use it outside, but I haven't tried them yet.
customer_reviews.author: MeanPanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice little target
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done and makes chipping fun. Short game is the key and this is easy to take with you and makes practice more focused.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DePaolo

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated. A little small for chipping from more than 25 yards, but perfect for the yard. You need to use the included stakes to keep longer chips from moving the net.
customer_reviews.author: Five G in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Little Net
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chipping net that folds down very compactly for storage. It works great outside using regular golf balls as long as you use the metal stakes that are included. Indoors I use soft practice balls (Callaway) and the net still works great. I can't believe the price is so low!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as gift.
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped on time, purchased as a Christmas gift and has not been opened yet. a a a a
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this, helps him to improve his game. Durable and easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: You need extra parts to stabilize it if you plan ...
customer_reviews.text: You need extra parts to stabilize it if you plan to chip past 15-20 feet. I used metal clamps with 2x4's
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: my son who is 5 even loves this toy, although he is an avid golfer, He got it for Christmas and has loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The net is very flimsy. The net barely stands on its own, and falls over if not on sold ground. The size is also deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Husband hasn't opened it yet
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves playing golf so I bought him some new training tools for his birthday. He opened the putting mat immediately but now, 3 weeks later, he has not opened the chipping target. I think he will soon, we've been a little busy, but my thought is that if it was something he really wanted he would have opened it already.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Smith (Arizona)

customer_reviews.title: Tips over when you hit a ball into the net
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, the designers did not test this out before going to market. The whole thing tips over when you chip into the net. Either is needs more weight in the front, or a wider stand.
customer_reviews.author: stumcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to set-up and use. The biggest let down is that the only thing provided to store it is basically a headband. Lose that and they won't stay closed. Without the stakes they are pretty worthless as well from more than 3 feet away, they just flip over.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie J

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works, you have to stake it down in a yard though. Not freestanding.
customer_reviews.author: JamieK

product_meta.title: IZZO Mini Mouth Chipping Net
product_meta.description: Just grab it and go! Whether you’re headed to the backyard or setting up indoors, the IZZO Golf Mini Mouth Chipping Net is the training aid you need in hand to help you improve your golf game. The 24” diameter chipping net has an easy pop up assembly making set up and take down simple to do in seconds. Engineered with two target pockets for more accurate shot making. You’ll find your chipping aim sharpened in no time! Improve your golf game day by day when you’re putting the IZZO Golf Mini Mouth Chipping Net to use.
feature_bullets: Patented pop up design for quick assembly
Collapses to 12.5" diameter for easier storage; fits in most golf bags

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
